greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of Fibonacci(n) into exactly n positive Fibonacci numbers.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
mathematica: (* Program not suitable for a large number of terms. *)
a[n_] := a[n] = If[n < 2, 1, IntegerPartitions[Fibonacci[n], {n}, Fibonacci[Range[2, n - 1]]] //Length];
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Sep 20 2018
